languages.text: [Обратиться к людям] "Довольно терпеть ксеносскую скверну рядом с истинными имперцами! Этими словами да провозглашаю я главенство Имперского кредо в этой части Прорвы — идите и разите нечестивых!"

traits.locale_text: [Обратиться к людям] "Довольно терпеть ксеносскую скверну рядом с истинными имперцами! Этими словами да провозглашаю я главенство Имперского Кредо в этой части Прорвы — идите и разите нечестивых!"

languages.text: [Address the people] "Long have we, true servants of the Imperium, tolerated the xenos taint around us! It is with these words that I pronounce the absolute authority of the Imperial Creed in this part of the Chasm! Go now and strike down the impure!"
languages.original_text: [Обратиться к людям] "Довольно терпеть ксеносскую скверну рядом с истинными имперцами! Этими словами да провозглашаю я главенство Имперского кредо в этой части Прорвы — идите и разите нечестивых!"

traits.locale_text: [Address the people] "Long have we, true servants of the Imperium, tolerated xenos taint at our side! It is with these words that I pronounce the absolute authority of the Imperial Creed in this part of the Chasm! Go now and strike down the impure!"

[Address the people] "Long have we, true servants of the Imperium, tolerated xenos taint at our side! It is with these words that I pronounce the absolute authority of the Imperial Creed in this part of the Chasm! Go now and strike down the impure!"

[Address the people] "Long have we, true servants of the Imperium, tolerated xenos taint at our side! It is with these words that I pronounce the absolute authority of the Imperial Creed in this part of the Chasm! Go now and strike down the impure!"

[Address the people] "Long have we, true servants of the Imperium, tolerated the xenos taint around us! It is with these words that I pronounce the absolute authority of the Imperial Creed in this part of the Chasm! Go now and strike down the impure!"

[Address the people] "Long have we, true servants of the Imperium, tolerated the xenos taint around us! It is with these words that I pronounce the absolute authority of the Imperial Creed in this part of the Chasm! Go now and strike down the impure!"

languages.text: ［人々に語りかける］「我々は長い間、帝国の真の従者として周囲の異種族の汚濁を黙認してきた。この言葉により、私はこの裂け目において帝国信条集の絶対的権威を宣言する！今すぐ不浄の者を討て！」
languages.original_text: [Address the people] "Long have we, true servants of the Imperium, tolerated the xenos taint around us! It is with these words that I pronounce the absolute authority of the Imperial Creed in this part of the Chasm! Go now and strike down the impure!"

traits.locale_text: ［人々に語りかける］「我々は長い間、帝国の真の従者として周囲の異種族の汚濁を黙認してきた。この言葉により、私はこの裂け目において帝国信条集の絶対的権威を宣言する！今すぐ不浄の者を討て！」

languages.text: [对所有人开口]“这么长时间以来，我们，帝国真正的仆人，一直在容忍那些异形的亵渎！现在我宣布，在裂隙这片土地上，帝国的信仰有着绝对的权威！让我们出发，消灭那些亵渎的异形吧！”
languages.original_text: [Address the people] "Long have we, true servants of the Imperium, tolerated the xenos taint around us! It is with these words that I pronounce the absolute authority of the Imperial Creed in this part of the Chasm! Go now and strike down the impure!"

traits.locale_text: [对所有人开口]“这么长时间以来，我们，帝国真正的仆人，一直在容忍异形的亵渎！现在我宣布，在裂隙这片土地上，帝国的信仰有着绝对的权威！让我们出发，消灭那些亵渎的异形吧！”

languages.text: [Dirigirte a la gente] «¡Durante mucho tiempo, nosotros, verdaderos sirvientes del Imperium, hemos tolerado a los xenos a nuestro alrededor! ¡Con estas palabras pronuncio la autoridad absoluta del Credo Imperial en esta parte del Abismo! ¡Es hora de abatir a los impuros!».
languages.original_text: [Address the people] "Long have we, true servants of the Imperium, tolerated the xenos taint around us! It is with these words that I pronounce the absolute authority of the Imperial Creed in this part of the Chasm! Go now and strike down the impure!"

traits.locale_text: [Dirigirte a la gente] «¡Durante mucho tiempo, nosotros, verdaderos sirvientes del Imperium, hemos tolerado a los xenos a nuestro lado! ¡Con estas palabras pronuncio la autoridad absoluta del Credo Imperial en esta parte del Abismo! ¡Es hora de abatir a los impuros!».

languages.text: [Zu den Leuten sprechen] "Lange haben wir, treue Diener des Imperiums, den Xenos-Abschaum unter uns geduldet! Mit diesen Worten nun verkünde ich die absolute Autorität des Imperialen Glaubens in diesem Teil der Kluft! Zieht aus und streckt die Unreinen nieder!"
languages.original_text: [Address the people] "Long have we, true servants of the Imperium, tolerated the xenos taint around us! It is with these words that I pronounce the absolute authority of the Imperial Creed in this part of the Chasm! Go now and strike down the impure!"

traits.locale_text: [Zu den Leuten sprechen] "Lange haben wir, treue Diener des Imperiums, den Xenos-Abschaum an unserer Seite geduldet! Mit diesen Worten nun verkünde ich die absolute Autorität des Imperialen Glaubens in diesem Teil der Kluft! Zieht aus und streckt die Unreinen nieder!"

languages.text: [Vous adresser à la foule] « Voilà trop longtemps que nous, fidèles serviteurs de l'Imperium, tolérons la souillure des xénos ! Je déclare ici et maintenant que le Credo Impérial a désormais autorité absolue sur cette partie de l'Abîme ! Allez, et terrassez les impurs ! »
languages.original_text: [Address the people] "Long have we, true servants of the Imperium, tolerated the xenos taint around us! It is with these words that I pronounce the absolute authority of the Imperial Creed in this part of the Chasm! Go now and strike down the impure!"

traits.locale_text: [Vous adresser à la foule] « Voilà trop longtemps que nous, fidèles serviteurs de l'Imperium, tolérons la souillure des xénos à nos côtés ! Je déclare ici et maintenant que le Crédo Impérial a désormais autorité absolue sur cette partie de la Faille ! Allez, et terrassez les impurs ! »

languages.text: [Dinleyenlere hitap et] "İmparatorluk'un sadık hizmetkârları olarak etrafımızı saran iğrenç zenolara bu kadar göz yumduğumuz yeter! Yarık'ın bu topraklarında İmparatorluk İtikadı'nın kayıtsız şartsız egemenliğini ilan ediyorum! Haydi, namussuzların canını almaya koyulun!"
languages.original_text: [Address the people] "Long have we, true servants of the Imperium, tolerated the xenos taint around us! It is with these words that I pronounce the absolute authority of the Imperial Creed in this part of the Chasm! Go now and strike down the impure!"

traits.locale_text: [Dinleyenlere hitap et] "İmparatorluk'un sadık hizmetkârları olarak etrafımızı saran zenoların lekesine bu kadar göz yumduğumuz yeter! Artık Yarık'ın bu topraklarında İmparatorluk İtikadı'nın kayıtsız şartsız egemenliğini ilan ediyorum! Hadi, artık beklemeden namussuzları devirin!"
